=Comparison to NDT first-round at-large bids=

As a sanity check, we can compare the MLE ratings (with and without side bias correction) to the [http://groups.wfu.edu/NDT/HistoricalLists/copeland.html top five first-round teams]. The first-rounds were ranked in mid-February, while the MLE ratings are based on the entire season.
